snippet: Elena Ferrante, the popular Italian author whose identity has never been revealed, talks about her Naples novels, her reasons for anonymity, the intensity of motherhood and what women need to watch out for.
abstract: Italian writer Elena Ferrante, who has published extensively under pseudonym, has gained devoted following with her gripping novels about rich and complex lives of women; Ferrante, via email correspondence, defends her choice to remain anonymous and disputes rumors that she is a man.
lead_paragraph: Elena Ferrante, the popular Italian author whose identity has never been revealed, talks about her Naples novels, her reasons for anonymity, the intensity of motherhood and what women need to watch out for.

headline.main: Elena Ferrante, Author of Naples Novels, Stays Mysterious
headline.print_headline: Scant Clues to a Secret Identity
